title: Exclusive deal: Typhoon Pure water bottle and bag
content:
With a reusable water bottle, not only will you be doing your bit for the environment by avoiding single-use plastic bottles, but you’ll also be able to stay hydrated easily while on the go. What’s more, with a chic Typhoon Pure double wall bottle, you can keep your drink cold for up to 24 hours – or hot for up to 12. With this exclusive deal, you can get your hands on one of these stylish Typhoon bottles, plus a matching bottle bag that will take all the hassle out of carrying your water, for just £21.99! Simply use the code IMDEAL29 at the checkout.

A Typhoon Pure Double Wall Bottle 500ml

Part of the Typhoon Pure Colour range, this double wall bottle offers a robust steel shape that will keep liquids cold for 24 hours, and hot for 12 hours. Featuring double walled insulation and a wide neck to fit ice cubes, the bottle is made from environmentally sourced materials to allow you to reduce single plastic use while maintaining a stylish look.

  • Handwash Only
  • Dimensions: L 80 x W 80 x H 250mm

A Typhoon Pure Vegan Leather Bottle Bag

The Typhoon Pure Colour bottle bag has a zipped pocket for keeping accessories in one place. The vegan leather bottle bags are made to fit Typhoon’s glass and steel water bottles and are a great environmentally friendly solution to taking your bottle out and about with you.

  • Dimensions: L 100 x W 150 x H 355mm
